testcase.name: verifyResourceDataById

failure.message:
3 expectations failed. JSON path data.name doesn't match. Expected: true red Actual: cerulean
JSON path data.year doesn't match. Expected: <2002> Actual: 2000
JSON path data.color doesn't match. Expected: #BF1932 Actual: #98B2D1
